'Cause I sure didn't!$h"/pause 500/faceDirection Shane 3/speak Shane "Yeah, who could have imagined that back in the day a schlub like me was pretty fit, once.$3"/pause 800/faceDirection Alex 1/textAboveHead Alex "......"/pause 1000/faceDirection Alex 0/pause 200/speak Alex "...Anyway.$9#$b#So the two of us got talking..."/faceDirection Shane 0/pause 300/speak Shane "And just the other day we put our knuckleheads together to hatch a plan.$6"/pause 300/speak Alex "Thing is, though... we're broke.$9"/speak Shane "Short five grand, actually, after we've pooled our earnings.$s"/pause 700/faceDirection Shane 3/pause 100/faceDirection Alex 1/pause 700/faceDirection Alex 0/speak Alex "I hope it's not too much to ask. We really wanna make it happen before the first game of the season, but we can't scrape the cash together soon enough.$s"/faceDirection Shane 0/speak Shane "What do you say, @? Care to spare a loan?"/pause 200/question fork0 "Contribute 5,000g for the guys' community project?#Yes#No"/fork giveAlexMoney/playMusic none/addMailReceived nomoneymiser/pause 1000/textAboveHead Shane "Hmph."/pause 500/playSound shwip/faceDirection Alex 1 true/pause 50/showFrame Alex 27/emote Alex 28/pause 200/speak Shane "Didn't figure you for such a miser...$s"/faceDirection Shane 3/speak Shane "Come on, kid. Why don't we find you a few odd jobs to do around town, or whatever.$3"/friendship Shane -50/pause 100/showFrame Shane 19/pause 600/emote Shane 12 true/move Shane 17 0 1 true/shake Alex 1500/showFrame Alex 4/pause 50/showFrame Alex 8/pause 500/emote Alex 40/pause 400/speak Alex "Whatever... whatever happened to having each other's backs? Entries.giveAlexMoney: pause 200/addMailReceived gaveAlexMoney/playSound shiny4/money -5000/speak Shane "You're doing us a solid, @. You can bet on sure odds we'll pay you back.$6"/emote Alex 32/pause 500/speak Alex "Swing by the saloon on Sunday once fall rolls in and we'll show what use we're putting the money to!$h"/friendship Shane 20/friendship Alex 50/pause 500/end

Entries.3917589/k giveAlexMoney/d Mon/d Tue/d We: continue/-1000 -1000/farmer 100 100 2/addWorldState saloonSportsRoom/addMailReceived saloonSportsRoom/message "I wonder if Shane and Alex ever managed to save up for their project...?"/end

Entries.3917590/n saloonSportsRoom: distantBanjo/-100 -100/farmer 31 20 0 Alex 32 7 0 Shane 33 8 0 Gus 34 8 0 Kent 35 8 0 George 36 7 0/skippable/specificTemporarySprite gridballGameTV/viewport 34 7 true/move farmer 0 -13 1 true/pause 1000/textAboveHead Alex "Big play!"/pause 800/jump Gus/pause 2000/textAboveHead George "Score!"/pause 400/textAboveHead Shane "There we go!"/faceDirection Kent 3 true/faceDirection Gus 1 true/animate Gus false true 100 22/animate Kent false true 100 17/shake Gus 500/shake Kent 500/pause 500/textAboveHead George "Atta boy!"/pause 1000/stopAnimation Gus/stopAnimation Kent/faceDirection Kent 0 true/faceDirection Gus 0/pause 1000/faceDirection Alex 3/pause 400/{{checkMiser1}}/pause 300/faceDirection Alex 3/speak Alex "I've been thinking... You know how I've always wanted to become a professional athlete someday?#$b#Well, it's looking like that dream is a bit further away than I had imagined...$9"/pause 100/speak Alex "But don't go thinking I'm anywhere near calling it quits, even if it'll take a leap of faith to cross that divide!$h"/pause 100/faceDirection Alex 1/pause 300/showFrame Alex 27/speak Alex "...People do say you've still got to *look* before you leap, and when I look around...$9#$b#When I really look, I see a lot of us are on the edges of things.$9"/pause 150/speak Alex "But this town we've got is one too small for letting folks get lost in the crowd.$s"/emote Alex 40/pause 600/showFrame Alex 12/speak Alex "So I thought, wouldn't it be cool to have a place where us guys could hang out and catch the Sunday game? Gus liked the idea so much, he let me and Shane kit out his back room!"/pause 100/speak Alex "It's a small gesture, but one that'll go a long way to remind me I'll never give up on the drive to chase after my dreams, not even when the end zone seems to be drifting out of reach...!"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 600/faceDirection George 3/speak George "You did good, son. I could watch this at home, but coming here makes me feel young again!$h"/faceDirection Alex 1/speak Alex "Thanks, Grandpa."/pause 200/speak Kent "I'm happy to get out of the house and socialize with people again.$h"/pause 1200/speed Shane 1/faceDirection Alex 2/move Shane -2 0 0/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 100/speak Shane "To be honest, I used to think the part of me that loved gridball was drowned for good by the booze...$s#$b#But now that I've pulled my head outta the bottle, it turns out I still am actually capable of caring about what it is that drew me into the game in the first place...$3"/pause 300/speak Shane "It's the sheer joy of being able to root for the same team."/pause 300/speak Shane "{{checkMiser2}} I managed to turn my life around right when I thought I'd already gone over the deep end... down to wallow at rock bottom."/pause 300/speak Shane "I came to realize we're all on this one team of *some* kind here: the burn-outs and beaten-downs, the crips and hard-lucks. Each one of us... better, together...$6"/emote farmer 16/faceDirection Gus 3/pause 300/speak Gus "And don't none of you dare think the glory days are over and done with just because it ain't *your* cleats eating up the yards on that there field!$3"/pause 60/faceDirection Shane 1/emote Shane 8/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 60/faceDirection Alex 1/pause 500/textAboveHead Gus "Remember..."/pause 200/pause 60/faceDirection Kent 3/move Gus -2 0 3/faceDirection Alex 2/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 2/speak Gus "Whatever the future may hold, you lot will always be the true, shining all-stars here at the Stardrop."/pause 500/emote Shane 28/shake Shane 2000/pause 400/showFrame Shane 19/pause 900/animate Shane true true 1000 35/pause 300/jump farmer/pause 60/jump Alex/pause 60/jump Gus/pause 60/jump Kent/pause 60/emote George 16/pause 50/textAboveHead Shane "Buuagh..."/pause 600/speak Shane "...positivity...overload !!!$10"/pause 300/speak Shane "You're killin' me, Gus, I swear...!$7"/pause 400/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 100/animate farmer false true 100 102 103/faceDirection Alex 3/emote Alex 32/faceDirection George 0/pause 100/faceDirection Kent 0/pause 1600/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 400/message "It seems the guys have a new Sunday tradition!"/pause 1000/end
